ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Generating high-quality person images with precise control over appearance and pose, minimizing distortion of fine-grained details.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Controllable person image generation â€¢ Virtual try-on â€¢ Pose transfer â€¢ Diffusion-based model â€¢ Attention mechanism
ðŸ“– Summary: Leffa is a unified framework for controllable person image generation, enabling precise manipulation of appearance and pose. It uses a novel flow field regularization in the attention layer to reduce distortion in virtual try-on and pose transfer tasks. The model supports float16 inference for faster generation and is designed to be model-agnostic, improving performance of other diffusion models.
